Felix Heidrich
Diploma Thesis Student 
                This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
                                                








 
 My thesis is about interaction with wall-sized displays in Ambient Assisted Living (AAL) Environments. My supervisor is Carsten Röcker.

Publications

  2011

  Felix Heidrich, Martina Ziefle, Carsten Röcker and Jan Borchers. Interacting with Smart Walls: A Multi-Dimensional Analysis of Input Technologies for Augmented Environments.     In Proceedings of the ACM Augmented Human Conference (AH'11),  ACM, New York, NY, March    2011.  


Heidrich, F., Stachelhaus, T., Russell, P. (2007) Intervision3D: Online 3D Visualisation and Conferencing, CAADRIA 2007 (Proceedings of the 12th International Conference on Computer Aided Architectural Design Research in Asia), pp. 203-210.

This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.



My thesis is about interaction with wall-sized displays in Ambient Assisted Living (AAL) Environments. My supervisor is Carsten Röcker.

Publications

    2011
